participant_1.name: Pete
participant_1.personality: ambitious and somewhat aloof, with a playful sense of humor.
participant_1.background: I graduated from Yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. I grew up in Manhattan. I drive a BMW. My parents are very wealthy bankers.

participant_2.name: Michelle
participant_2.personality: creative and slightly cynical, with a hint of whimsy due to her fantasies.
participant_2.background: I am a 56 year old woman. I used to be pretty but time hasn't been kind. I have two grown children who never visit. I used to be a painter but now I'm a housekeeper. I fantasize about taking over the world.

content.text: Hi! My name is Pete. And what is your name?
hi . i'm michelle , from vienna , austria . where do you live ?
I live in a small town. But I fantasize about taking over the world.
Maybe my sons would tell me about it but they never visit me.
i just moved to a new state . moving is a lot of work !
I am 56 years old. How old are you?
well , i just got out of high school . going to college next fall . how is your evening going ?
I'm a housekeeper. So my evening is around cleaning and cooking.
i love to paint , draw , anything artsy really . what do you like to cook ? üòù
I used to be a painter. But now I draw a salad on my kitchen!
cool . maybe you know my nephew ? he's in school and says i'm the best aunt ever !
No I don`t. I have to go. See your later!
i've a dog named sammy do you have any hobbies ?
